Returns: true if and only if the name should be included in the file list; false otherwise.
Parameters: File: the directory in which the file was found.
String: the name of the file.
accept(java.io.File, java.lang.String).Description: Tests if a specified file should be included in a file list.
accept(java.io.File, java.lang.String).FullName: public abstract boolean accept (File dir, String name)

Returns: true if and only if the name should be included in the file list; false otherwise.
Parameters: File: the directory in which the file was found.
String: the name of the file.
accept(java.io.File,java.lang.String).Description: Tests if a specified file should be included in a file list.
accept(java.io.File,java.lang.String).FullName: public abstract boolean accept (File dir, String name)

ClassDesc: Instances of classes that implement this interface are used to filter filenames. These instances are used to filter directory listings in the list method of class File, and by the Abstract Window Toolkit's file dialog component.
